"Bergmann": "You're the best! Alright, hear me out."
"Honestly, I could never get tired of watching the visual data you've sent me so far."
"Looking back at all those memories puts a real spring back into my step, you know!"
"So, I've wanted to revisit the forests lately. Since this is Aelio, that means the Resol Forest."
"It's a bit more dangerous than other places, but I'd never ask you to bark up the wrong trees. Bah-hah-hah!"
"I'm not even asking you to go right away or anything. Just when you've got some time to branch out. Bah-hah-hah! Someone stop me!"
